Name: Milanese G&T
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of half orange slice wheel.
POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass.
Review: Depending on how you view this, it's a traditional Gin & Tonic with a splash of bitter liqueur adding colour and herbal fruity complexity. Or a G&T take on the classic Negroni cocktail .
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2016 at Campari's then-London office in The Shard.
Nutrition: One serving of Milanese G&T contains 184 calories
